nodes.text: Linear Miasma was a nebula in the Endor system

Frequented by the Linear Miasma Scientists, this nebula provided a wealth of information and research for the lone band, belonging to the Endorian Researchers Guild. The scientists proved to be a friendly bunch time and time again despite the presence of the Spice Pirates, and the Zynt'aia Spice Guardians, both of whom resided nearby.
